metadata.synopsis: A football star (Ken Wahl) and a policeman (Matt Frewer) foil a mad billionaire's plot to loot the city during a toxic-spill scare.

reviews: Unable to maintain the compelling strands of its B-movie narrative from jump, lovers of Die Hard knockoffs and early 1990s cinema may find this of interest, while those hoping for a portrait of Los Angeles from the period will also be disappointed.
This film captures four times the excess of Die Hard on a quarter of the budget.
